content:
Suppose you have a dataset of activities that you want to sort into a specific order. Here are the activities with additional information about their corresponding duration:
| Activity   | Duration (hours) |
|------------|------------------|
| Celebration| 2 |
| Study      | 4 |
| Exercise   | 1 |
| Relaxation | 3 |
Using the duration column as a reference, what is the correct order of the activities from shortest to longest?

To sort the activities based on their duration from shortest to longest, you would arrange them as follows:

1. Exercise (1 hour)
2. Celebration (2 hours)
3. Relaxation (3 hours)
4. Study (4 hours)
